text.div:
RadiationProcedureVS ValueSet

Codes describing radiation therapy procedures. Includes codes from SNOMED CT and ICD-10-PCS. ICD-10-PCS codes are not constrained. CPT codes are not explicitly included due to licensing restrictions.

name: RadiationProcedureVS
description: Codes describing radiation therapy procedures. Includes codes from SNOMED CT and ICD-10-PCS. ICD-10-PCS codes are not constrained. CPT codes are not explicitly included due to licensing restrictions.
